# Unicorn Sport - User Journeys

## ğŸ¯ Overview

This document outlines the key user journeys for each stakeholder type in the Unicorn Sport platform.

---

## ğŸ‘¤ Stakeholder Types

| Type | Description | Primary Goal |
|------|-------------|--------------|
| **Player** | Young athlete (10-21 years) | Get discovered by scouts |
| **Academy Admin** | Unicorn Sport staff | Create profiles, upload content, manage platform |
| **Scout** | Professional talent scout | Find verified young talent |
| **Club/Academy** | Football club or academy | Recruit talent for programs |

> **Note**: Players do NOT self-register. Academy staff creates all player accounts and profiles.

---

## ğŸ“± Mobile-First Considerations

### Low Bandwidth Optimizations

| Feature | Mobile Optimization |
|---------|---------------------|
| Video Upload | Resume-able uploads, compression on device |
| Video Playback | Adaptive bitrate, offline download |
| Images | Progressive loading, thumbnails first |
| Pages | Minimal JavaScript, fast first paint |
| Offline | Core features available offline (PWA) |

### Feature Phone Support (Future)

- USSD registration option
- SMS verification
- Basic profile via SMS
- Video upload via agent assistance
